sentences.sContent: One day he was fishing with another boy when a gamekeeper suddenly darted forth from a thicket.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day he was fishing with another boy when a gamekeeper suddenly darted forth from a thicket.
sentences.sCn: 有一天他正和另一个男孩在那边钓鱼，突然从灌木丛里窜出一个看守。

sentences.sContent: They showed me the hidden things silence revealed: a pheasant craning its neck to spy on us from a thicket, a crow hopping from branch to branch, a raccoon snoring in its den.
sentences.sContent_eng: They showed me the hidden things silence revealed: a pheasant craning its neck to spy on us from a thicket, a crow hopping from branch to branch, a raccoon snoring in its den.
sentences.sCn: 他们指给我那些原本隐藏起来、却被寂静暴露了的东西：一头野鸡从灌木丛中伸长脖子打探我们，一只乌鸦在树枝间跳来跳去，一只浣熊在窝里打鼾。

words.tran: 变浓；变厚；变得模糊；变粗；变复杂
使变厚；使模糊；使…变复杂

trans.tranOther: a group of bushes and small trees
